column4: cara,nixnoob: newinstalaltions fails with permittion denied /usr/bin/open.. | kyncani : nope, no such file or dir
kyncani : nope, no such file or dir
kyncani : yes, but as package already removed, no file could be found by dlocate
packet already removed, want to delete /usr/sbin/sshd
you should fine what owns it with "dpkg -S /usr/sbin/sshd"
if "sudo rm /usr/sbin/sshd" does not work, check to see whether your filesystem is mounted read-only
